alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 11:51PM AKST until January 09 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 13 inches, with greatest amounts north of Coffman Cove. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Petersburg, Wrangell, Kake, Point Baker, Whale Pass, Ketchikan, Coffman Cove, Thorne Bay, Hollis, Kasaan, and Metlakatla. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Winds could down trees and cause power outages. Heavy, wet snow will be difficult to manage. Ponding could develop after a changeover to rain. In areas of deep snow pack, additional snow and a changeover to rain could challenge load bearing ability of roof- tops, boats, and aircraft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of snow has developed over northern Prince of Wales Island with a report of 3 inches already at Whale Pass. This band is expected to remain in place overnight with snow accumulations of about 6 inches through Saturday morning mainly for the northern half of Prince of Wales Island. The period of heavy snow is still expected to arrive Saturday afternoon into Saturday night. There is a chance of snow mixing with freezing rain at times. A change to all rain is expected on Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Southern Inner Channels
